content: in this legal case the court in milan has declared the dissolution of a joint inheritance between two parties the property in question is a residential flat with 4 rooms a kitchen two balconies a cellar and a private garage located in vanzago the court has determined that the property cannot be divided and has awarded the entire property to one of the coheirs with a cash settlement of €4392050 to be paid to the other party the court has also considered the separate hereditary successions of the parties and concluded that the property should be divided equally between them the court has adopted the findings of an expert witness report and has ordered both parties to share the costs of the report and condominium charges the court has also ordered the payment of €5300000 to one party taking into account outstanding condominium expenses of €1815900 the costs incurred by the plaintiff are recoverable while the costs of the condominium and the division action are also recoverable the court made its final decision on january 16 2020
